Hello Startup: Product Design

Posted by Baiqi Zhang on June 2, 2016

##Types of MVPs Landing page: > New research suggests that employees with a diverse Twitter network — one that exposes them to people and ideas they don’t already know — tend to generate better ideas. >

I seldom use twitter before, nor their Chinese counterpart(Sina Microblog). As a very technical person, I cared more about top papers or hottest open-source projects.
